I feel it would be beneficial to both Riot and the playerbase if we had the option to rent champions or even skins for a limited duration at a smaller cost. Players low on IP or RP could have a chance to play even the shiniest champions for a few days/weeks, and Riot could benefit a lot from a potentially much larger influx of small payments (it would also act as an IP sink, which is a problem with the current economy). Since players would find out very quickly if they like a champion or not, they could then purchase the champion permanently by paying the difference, or just abandon them completely at the end of the duration, so we wouldn't end up in the current situation where players can only make permanent, and much more expensive choices.
If you need to rent champions, why would you need an IP sink? We need an IP sink for people with eighty thousand IP saved up with no purpose.

I'm talking about a business model for League on live. The PBE is a testing environment that makes content freely available to everyone there so they can check for bugs and give feedback, whereas I'm proposing an alternative to the current refund system that would allow for any user to try champions out temporarily for a small cost. The problem with purchases in League is that they're often costly (6300 IP takes a little while to build up) and irreversible, which means it's impossible to go back on a decision after spending a ton of currency on a champion you don't like. Letting players try champions out temporarily at a much smaller fee would eliminate the need for a refund system, since anyone unsure of a champion could just take them for a spin before having to decide whether or not to pay the full price for  unlocking them permanently.

The reason you have refunds: To exchange a mistake with the purchase of a skin, champ, or ward skin that you may not have liked after you have used it

The reason you don't have unlimited refunds: To keep players from redeeming a skin or champ over and over again so that you do not have to actually spend that much money to get them

BTW, refunding a skin or champ does not lose Riot money. They make money the moment you purchase RP, not when buying a skin or champ
